title: Epic: Agents
description:
Implement the three core agents and orchestrator.

## Agents
1. Analyze Agent - Classify spend as good/bad/monitor
2. Recommend Agent - Generate budget + creative recommendations
3. Execute Agent - Mock write with confirmation
4. Agatha Orchestrator - Coordinate agent flow

## Good/Bad Spend Logic
- GOOD: ROAS >= 2x avg, spend >= $1k, >= 7 days
- BAD: ROAS = 0 after $5k+/7d, or < 0.5x avg
- WAIT: < 7 days or < $1k spend
